title: Reminder that this item exists
body:
{{item:3123}} 

Executioner's Calling.

UNIQUE – EXECUTIONER: Physical damage inflicts **Grievous Wounds** on enemy champions for 3 seconds.

**Grievous Wounds** is a debuff that reduces all healing received by 40%.

------------------

Against heavy heals, get it. I don't care that your super awesome best-in-slot fullbuild ADC guide doesn't include it. Get it. It's called adaptation.

Ignite has a cooldown. Executioner's Calling doesn't.

Get it.
